SELECT ROUT.ROUT_ID AS ROUT_ID , ROUT.INTER_ROUT_ID AS INTER_ROUT_ID , ROUT.ROUT_NM AS ROUT_NM , DVC_NAME AS DVC_NAME , DLCD.DL_CD_NM AS USER_WAY_DIV_NM , DLCD2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_TYPE FROM BM_ROUT_INFO ROUT LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD ON DLCD.CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG' AND ROUT.USER_WAY_DIV = DLCD.TXT_VAL1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD2 ON DLCD2.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND DLCD2.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD' WHERE ROUT.DVC_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND ( ROUT.ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.INTER_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.DVC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') )

SELECT IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) AS POSSIBLE , VHC.VHC_ID AS VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO AS VHC_NO , DL.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON DVC.INST_LOC = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT JOIN BM_DESTI_RSV_RST RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DL.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD'
GROUP BY VHC_ID ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID

SELECT DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD001' || DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD002') AND VHC.VHC_ID = #{value}
